title: How I'd Learn AI Agents FAST if I Had to Start Over (Full Roadmap)
description:
If you're trying to learn AI agents right now, you're probably drowning in scattered tutorials and conflicting advice. Personally, I spent months when I was first starting just jumping between random resources, making zero real progress. Now after building hundreds of AI agents, I've figured out the exact roadmap I wish I had on day one.

In this video, I'll walk you through the complete roadmap I'd follow to learn AI agents from scratch today! By the end, you'll have a clear plan to go from beginner to building real AI agents fast. The world is your oyster when you know how to build AI agents effectively - don't miss out on this opportunity.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

If you're looking to join a community for early AI adopters to master AI & AI Agents and transform your career or business, check out Dynamous here:

https://dynamous.ai

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Apparently YouTube only lets me add 5 video cards, so I couldn't add cards for some of the videos I mention towards the end. Here are all videos I referenced throughout the roadmap:

1. Agents vs. Workflows: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GYFTQU2iV4A
2. MCP Crash Course: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v_6EXt6T83I
3. Agentic RAG w/ n8n: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mQt1hOjBH9o
4. AI Coding Guide: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SS5DYx6mPw8
5. Coding AI Agents: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U6LbW2IFUQw
6. AI Agent Components: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TV8SyEuSMIA
7. Deploying AI Agents: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Ai7_5G70xY
8. Langfuse: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpPVEw4dd0w

Out of the box tools I covered in the video:

Claude Desktop: https://claude.ai/download
Aqua Voice: https://withaqua.com/
Mem: https://mem.ai/
Perplexity: https://www.perplexity.ai/

Anthropic article on agent architecture I mentioned:

https://www.anthropic.com/engineering/building-effective-agents

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

00:00 - Introducing My Fast Track for Master AI Agents
00:57 - Roadmap Overview
01:31 - Phase 1 - The Foundation
05:23 - Phase 2 - No Code AI Agents
07:18 - Phase 3 - AI Coding Assistants
08:58 - Phase 4 - Coding AI Agents
11:13 - Phase 5 - Advanced Agent Architecture
12:35 - Phase 6 - Deploying AI Agents
13:53 - Phase 7 - Agent Monitoring/Observability
14:51 - Phase 8 - Agent Evaluation
16:43 - Phase 9 - Learning AI with Others
18:21 - Phase 10 - Leveraging Your New Skillset
19:50 - Outro

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Join me as I push the limits of what is possible with AI. I'll be uploading videos at least two times a week - Sundays and Wednesdays at 7:00 PM CDT!
